item.title: Your laptop as part of the service mesh
item.description: In this talk, we will show how we used Istio’s EnvoyFilter to dynamically route requests from our QA cluster to a developer’s laptop and back. This networking hack significantly eased development, especially when running end-to-end tests and helped us reduce infrastructure costs.
